text: Giorgio Oppi (8 February 1940 â€“ 26 July 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy until 12 May 2009. He was born in Iglesias, Italy. Oppi died at a hospital in Cagliari, Italy on 26 July 2022 from problems caused by pancreatitis at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatitis Category:Politicians from Sardinia
title: Giorgio Oppi
